inclusion.criterion: alpha angle on plain AP pelvis radiograph
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: study patient agrees to follow physiotherapy program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: study patient has understood and signed informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MRI-identified delamination will be included in CarGel group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lesion size greater than 2cm2 on intraoperative measurement
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: medical conditions that makes the study patient unable to complete the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: coagulation disorders of the blood or receiving anticoagulant therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis and crystal arthropathies such as gout, pseudogout etc.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chondral damage opposing the cartilage lesion (kissing lesions)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to chitosan or hypersensitivity to crustaceans such as shrimp, lobster and crab
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: general pathology that might prevent the collection of data on an extended duration
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. His sister had similar problems.
